2: Stick me on a postcard and ill be your friend

Mmmm... doesn't this stamp make you want to book a deluxe room now?
This special commemorative stamp was only available from the Advent Calendar in year 4.
This stamp is much better than your basic Money Tree stamp, its hand painted for a start :)
If your pet is feeling less than chipper, take them to the hospital and they will soon be feeling back to normal.

Wow... so this is what Jelly world looks like!

6: NeoQuest is a very popular game in Neopia, and can be exceedingly frustrating towards the higher levels.
He looks scary, even in two dimensions.
Not only is it rotting, its also on fire!
Hey, they never said we could get a mist paintbrush!
Last thing you want to meet when you are down to one hit point with no healing potions!
Masters of magic, the archmagi of the Two Rings command armies of lesser wizards, but are themselves formidable foes who may summon the elements to do their bidding.
A long-time resident of Neopia City, Boraxis is there to heal your wounds and injuries whenever you need his assistance.
These ardent defenders of Jahbals realm patrol the hills and forests of the Two Rings mountains, defending against any who would intrude there.

A crazy old servant, Pomanna worked in the jungle research facility until it was overrun by monsters. Now, she hides in the deepest level, protecting her home from invasion by Rollays monstrous lizards.
This mischievious pair may help you out on your travels through the NeoQuest realm.
This black market dealer is now immortalised in stamp form!
Eeek its a terrifying black Bearog
A fierce and noble guardian that will look great in your stamp album.
This Quiggle loves his swamp and has a rather bizarre hobby.
An ancient wizard, trapped within the desert-entombed Temple of Roo is now trapped in a stamp!
This stamp is all shiny and golden!
Once a great ruler of Kal Panning, Faleinn will need your help if she is ever going to break her curse.
For something so small Kreai causes a whole lot of trouble!
Moraxs armour has aided many an eager traveller.
Why choose between light and dark when you can wield them both?
Keen student and sworn enemy of Gors the Mighty, Tylix can prove very helpful in your quest.
You wouldn't get very far without the aid of Eleus!
A gigantic mutated pygmy that you really wouldn't want to meet on a dark night.
Even being banished to the bottom of the Dank Cave didn't stop Xantan proving a real pain to beat.
7: Remember all those great Snow Wars tactics with this catapult stamp.
A colourful design that will look great in any stamp album!
It's a happy little snow man, how cute.

A beautiful scene taken from the top of Terror Mountain.
Aww look its Mika and Carassa!

Behold the grace and elegance of the Christmas Kougra.
This happy little Uni will add some seasonal cheer to any stamp album.
This angelic looking Zafara makes this stamp look simply stunning.
A cute photo of the Wocky that runs the Scratchcard Kiosk :)
Now you can own a Candychan stamp, even if you don't have one as a Petpet.
It almost makes you want to run outside and pick up a snowball.
It looks like someone has hung their stocking up wishing it will magically be filled with presents.
Don't get the letters wrong or the Tuskaninny will plummet to his doom!
This little Kougra looks very happy that it is snowing.
All kinds of frozen treats can be purchased at this shop!
A pretty watercolour of the Negg Faerie and her favourite Negg.
Nobody talks about what went on one dark, cold winter ago...
Eeek the Snowager looks awfully angry in this picture!
A cute little Snowbunny has hopped right into this stamp!
The rarest stamp in the Snowy Valley collection!
8: The heroes of the story, the ones that discovered the lost realm of Meridell.
How does it stay in the air?
What a lovely castle, shame it is about to be reduced to rubble.
The Green Knight fighting a Draconian Skeith
Loyal, gruff and incredibly large, it's no wonder nobody disagrees with him.
One of many loyal Moehog warriors that fought for the freedom of Darigan.
Without the loyal Draik guards Meridell Castle would be defenceless.
The only prisoner to escape the dungeons of Darigan beams smugly from this stamp.
A symbol of honour and pride to all of Meridell.
Possibly the cutest thing to come out of Darigan.
This shield seems to have some bad anti-aliasing around it. I wonder if that was on purpose?
Swooping down from the sky this Eyrie terrified many a Meridell resident before the war was over.
Ooops looks like someone got a little hungry while making this stamp!
Dark, brooding and mysterious, this Elemental is something you don't want to mess with.
The stamps border contrasts perfectly with Illusen's chestnut hair, almost as if she planned it.
A glistening enchanting gem that holds many mysterious powers.
Its our lovable heroes in zombie form!
Once a proud ruler of a fair kingdom, Lord Darigan searched for the orb to restore peace to his citadel.
King Skarl, ruler of Meridell and possibly the grumpiest king in Neopia.
Master Vex is a prison warden who is incredibly bored. Lord Darigan has entrusted him to keep his dungeons safe and secure.
The twisted demonic version of Lord Darigan brings tears to most Neopets eyes.
The loyal Jeran, defender of all things true and fair.

A beautiful night scene featuring a majestic Desert Lupe.

Senator Barca requested a sepia tone stamp to show off her complexion.
This dazzling paint brush design is much sought after.
This kind Peophin runs the Lost Desert Petpet shop where she cares for Petpets until they can find good homes.
A bit of a delicacy in the Lost Desert, Grackle Bugs are best cooked over an open fire.
This stamp features the beautiful yet treacherous Princess Sankara.
This stamp looks a little bit tatty around the edges. It must be very old!
Nobody knows how it got there or who made it but it is very impressive.
Everyone loves the Fruit Machine, especially this happy little Kougra.
Princess Vyssa gave special permission to allow this stamp to be printed.
A lovely sunset secene captured forever on this delightful stamp.
This cute Geb stamp is actually pretty rare.
Sorry Donna I borrowed this for a Lenny Conundrum prize!
A real piece of art, this scarab is made from very delicate hand made paper.
Ooh this stamp features the legendary Lucky Coin that Brucey B used to win all those Cheat games...
A mystical place where some say they can still feel King Coltzans presence.
